# Dust
### Dust II instant mid door smoke from T spawn
```
bind 7 "setpos -493.000244 -808.000061 169.333374;setang -11.840409 87.792999 0.000000";
bind 8 "setpos -332.000000 -754.000000 138.009216;setang -10.777903 91.384407 0.000000";
bind 9 "setpos -1076.000000 -843.000000 180.306274;setang -40.525177 75.833115 0.000000";
bind 0 "setpos -367.000000 -808.000000 143.944260;setang -24.697409 90.489426 0.000000";
bind - "setpos -428.000000 -843.000000 156.245865;setang -3.394644 88.769226 0.000000";
bind = "setpos -1181.000000 -754.000000 182.950409;setang -27.336687 71.760223 0.000000";
```

# Mirage
### Mirage instant window smoke from T spawn
```
bind 7 "setpos 1296.142212 32.064980 -104.128754;setang -28.920135 -165.717438 0.000000";  
bind 8 "setpos 1216.000000 -16.000031 -101.936905;setang -18.052094 -163.304764 0.000000";  
bind 9 "setpos 1216.000000 -115.000000 -101.936905;setang -28.083801 -169.291489 0.000000";  
bind 0 "setpos 1216.000000 -211.000000 -101.000809;setang -7.931411 -172.150345 0.000000";  
bind - "setpos 1296.000000 -352.000000 -104.128754;setang -10.615869 -175.800873 0.000000";
```

### Mirage silent drop from window to lower mid (W + Shift + Jump)
```
setpos -1247.968750 -704.924438 -104.128754;setang 34.661087 12.535137 0.000000
```
